item.title: New version: devel/julia version 1.11.4
item.description: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for numerical computing.

item.title: New version: physics/geos version 3.13.1
item.description: GEOS is a C/C++ library for computational geometry with a focus on algorithms used in geographic information systems (GIS) software.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/proj version 9.5.1
item.description: PROJ is a generic coordinate transformation software that transforms geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to another.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/imagemagick version 7.1.1-43
item.description: ImageMagick is a free and open-source software suite for displaying, converting, and editing raster image and vector image files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/portaudio version 19.7.0
item.description: PortAudio is a free, cross-platform, open-source, audio I/O library.

item.title: New module: system/wget version 1.25.0
item.description: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS, FTP and FTPS, the most widely used Internet protocols.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libmetalink version 0.1.3
item.description: Libmetalink is a library to read Metalink XML download description format.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libidn version 2.3.7
item.description: GNU Libidn is a fully documented implementation of the Stringprep, Punycode and IDNA 2003 specifications.

item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.description: vLLM is a fast and easy-to-use library for LLM inference and serving.

item.title: New module: biology/py-crested version 1.2.1_py312
item.description: CREsted (Cis-Regulatory Element Sequence Training, Explanation, and Design) is an easy-to-use deep learning package for training enhancer models on single-cell ATAC sequencing (scATAC-seq) data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-xgrammar version 0.1.8_py312
item.description: XGrammar is open-source solution for flexible, portable, and fast structured generations, aiming at bring flexible zero-overhead structure generation everywhere.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/ollama version 0.5.7
item.description: Ollama is a free, open-source platform that allows users to run large language models (LLMs) locally.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-rapids version 24.04_py39
item.description: NVIDIA RAPIDS is an open-source suite of GPU-accelerated data science and AI libraries with APIs that match the most popular open-source data tools.
